long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to 'Custom YouTube,' your indispensable Chrome extension for transforming your YouTube experience. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to focus! With this powerful tool, effortlessly hide related videos, comments, shorts, suggestions, homepage, and trending content.

Tailor your YouTube interface to match your preferences, creating a clean and personalized environment. Whether you're seeking a productivity boost or simply aiming to enjoy a clutter-free YouTube journey, 'Custom YouTube' has you covered.

Immerse yourself in a seamless, distraction-free viewing experience. Take control of your YouTube, stay focused, and enhance your productivity with the 'Custom YouTube' Chrome extension. Your personalized YouTube journey awaits
